scripts.startAll: concurrently -n userservice,authservice,llmservice,wikidataservice,gameservice,gatewayservice,webapp "npm --prefix users/userservice start" "npm --prefix users/authservice start" "npm --prefix llmservice start" "npm --prefix wikidataservice start" "npm --prefix gameservice start" "npm --prefix gatewayservice start" "npm --prefix webapp start"
